options.title: --backup[=CONTROL]
options.description: make a backup of each existing destination file

options.title: -b
options.description: like --backup but does not accept an argument

options.title: -c
options.description: (ignored)

options.title: -C, --compare
options.description:
compare each pair of source and destination files, and in some cases, do
      not modify the destination at all

options.title: -C, --compare
options.description:
compare each pair of source and destination files, and in some cases, do
      not modify the destination at all

options.title: -d, --directory
options.description:
treat all arguments as directory names; create all components of the
      specified directories

options.title: -d, --directory
options.description:
treat all arguments as directory names; create all components of the
      specified directories

options.title: -D
options.description:
create all leading components of DEST except the last, or all components
      of --target-directory, then copy SOURCE to DEST

options.title: -g, --group=GROUP
options.description: set group ownership, instead of process' current group

options.title: -g, --group=GROUP
options.description: set group ownership, instead of process' current group

options.title: -m, --mode=MODE
options.description: set permission mode (as in chmod), instead of rwxr-xr-x

options.title: -m, --mode=MODE
options.description: set permission mode (as in chmod), instead of rwxr-xr-x

options.title: -o, --owner=OWNER
options.description: set ownership (super-user only)

options.title: -o, --owner=OWNER
options.description: set ownership (super-user only)

options.title: -p, --preserve-timestamps
options.description:
apply access/modification times of SOURCE files to corresponding
      destination files

options.title: -p, --preserve-timestamps
options.description:
apply access/modification times of SOURCE files to corresponding
      destination files

options.title: -s, --strip
options.description: strip symbol tables

options.title: -s, --strip
options.description: strip symbol tables

options.title: --strip-program=PROGRAM
options.description: program used to strip binaries

options.title: -S, --suffix=SUFFIX
options.description: override the usual backup suffix

options.title: -S, --suffix=SUFFIX
options.description: override the usual backup suffix

options.title: -t, --target-directory=DIRECTORY
options.description: copy all SOURCE arguments into DIRECTORY

options.title: -t, --target-directory=DIRECTORY
options.description: copy all SOURCE arguments into DIRECTORY

options.title: -T, --no-target-directory
options.description: treat DEST as a normal file

options.title: -T, --no-target-directory
options.description: treat DEST as a normal file

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: print the name of each directory as it is created

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: print the name of each directory as it is created

options.title: --preserve-context
options.description: preserve SELinux security context

options.title: -Z
options.description:
set SELinux security context of destination file and each created
      directory to default type

options.title: --context[=CTX]
options.description:
like -Z, or if CTX is specified then set the SELinux or SMACK
      security context to CTX

options.title: --help
options.description: display this help and exit

options.title: --version
options.description: output version information and exit
